column4: what is the equivalent command of service network restart in ubuntu?
since i odn't know that command, i'm not sure.  what should it accomplish?
oh nm, i got it in context of what you asked before:  sudo /etc/init.d/networking restart
i edit interface and want to make that change work
i would just do this: sudo ifdown eth0 (which will probably say it wasn't up) then sudo ifup eth0
got it, another question where do i edit gateway i'll be using?
the gw setting in ifconfig?  you can add "gateway" line in the eth0 stanza of that file, iirc
type "man 5 interfaces" to get the exact syntax
i believe you mean sudo /etc/init.d/foo restart
